Articles.Content:
I apologize if I missed a topic on this as i searched for pink textures and nothing came up. I've been playing for awhile and decided to give KWrocketry a try so i could make some new spacecraft and when i got in game this started happening.

http://steamcommunity.com/id/rwaar21/screenshots/?appid=220200
 

its the top 3 screenshots there. I've tried clearing all mods and just installing kwrocketry and tried with all 3 versions of KSP on steam right now. What am I missing?
The first entry in the troubleshooting section gives you a few options.

3 hours ago, rwaar21 said:

I apologize if I missed a topic on this as i searched for pink textures and nothing came up. I've been playing for awhile and decided to give KWrocketry a try so i could make some new spacecraft and when i got in game this started happening.

http://steamcommunity.com/id/rwaar21/screenshots/?appid=220200
 

its the top 3 screenshots there. I've tried clearing all mods and just installing kwrocketry and tried with all 3 versions of KSP on steam right now. What am I missing?

that there is a missing material or shader, and does the main texture always look like that?? have you installed it correctly, are the files and paths as the should be , so no ksp/GameData/GameData/Mod/   problems, it;s worth a look, and just out of curiosity what format are the image files in?
